instruction: Create a simple flowchart with Start, Decision, and End nodes.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name="Page-1"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="2" value="Start" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="180" y="100" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="3" value="Process" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="180" y="200" width="100" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="4" value="End" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="180" y="320" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="5" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="2" target="3"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="6" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="3" target="4"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create a login flowchart: User → Login Page → Dashboard.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name="Page-1"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="user" value="User" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="100" y="100" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="login" value="Login Page" style="rectangle;rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="100" y="200" width="120" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="dashboard" value="Dashboard" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="100" y="320" width="120" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge1" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="user" target="login"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge2" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="login" target="dashboard"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create a decision flowchart: Start → Check Condition → Yes or No → End.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name="Page-1"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="start" value="Start" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="180" y="100" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="check" value="Check Condition" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="170" y="200" width="120" height="80" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="yes" value="Yes" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="80" y="320" width="80" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="no" value="No" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="280" y="320" width="80" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="end" value="End" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="180" y="420" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge1" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="start" target="check"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge2" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="check" target="yes"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge3" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="check" target="no"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge4" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="yes" target="end"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge5" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="no" target="end"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create an order processing flow: Order Received → Payment Processed → Confirmation Sent → Delivery.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name="Page-1"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="order" value="Order Received" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="160" y="80" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="payment" value="Payment Processed" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="160" y="160" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="confirmation" value="Confirmation Sent" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="160" y="240" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="delivery" value="Delivery" style="rectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="160" y="320" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge1" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="order" target="payment"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge2" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="payment" target="confirmation"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="edge3" style="endArrow=block;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="confirmation" target="delivery"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create a UML class diagram with User and Product classes connected by an association.

instruction: Create a signup process flowchart: User → Fill Form → Submit → Validation → Welcome Page.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name=\"Page-1\"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id=\"0\"/><mxCell id=\"1\" parent=\"0\"/><mxCell id=\"user\" value=\"User\" style=\"ellipse\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"20\" y=\"40\" width=\"100\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"form\" value=\"Fill Form\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"150\" y=\"40\" width=\"100\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"submit\" value=\"Submit\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"280\" y=\"40\" width=\"100\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"validate\" value=\"Validation\" style=\"rhombus\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"410\" y=\"40\" width=\"100\" height=\"60\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"welcome\" value=\"Welcome Page\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"550\" y=\"40\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e1\" edge=\"1\" source=\"user\" target=\"form\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e2\" edge=\"1\" source=\"form\" target=\"submit\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e3\" edge=\"1\" source=\"submit\" target=\"validate\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e4\" edge=\"1\" source=\"validate\" target=\"welcome\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create a hierarchy chart: CEO → Manager → Team Lead → Employee.
xml: <mxfile><diagram name=\"Page-1\"><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id=\"0\"/><mxCell id=\"1\" parent=\"0\"/><mxCell id=\"ceo\" value=\"CEO\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"200\" y=\"20\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"manager\" value=\"Manager\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"200\" y=\"80\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"lead\" value=\"Team Lead\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"200\" y=\"140\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"employee\" value=\"Employee\" style=\"rectangle\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry x=\"200\" y=\"200\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e1\" edge=\"1\" source=\"ceo\" target=\"manager\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e2\" edge=\"1\" source=\"manager\" target=\"lead\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell><mxCell id=\"e3\" edge=\"1\" source=\"lead\" target=\"employee\" parent=\"1\"><mxGeometry relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

instruction: Create a flowchart with parallel branches: Start → Task A and Task B → End.
xml: <mxfile host=\"app.diagrams.net\" modified=\"2025-05-29T12:00:00.000Z\" agent=\"Mozilla/5.0\" etag=\"sample123etag\" version=\"21.7.5\" type=\"device\"> <diagram name=\"Page-1\" id=\"parallel-flow\"> <mxGraphModel dx=\"1000\" dy=\"600\" grid=\"1\" gridSize=\"10\" guides=\"1\" tooltips=\"1\" connect=\"1\" arrows=\"1\" fold=\"1\" page=\"1\" pageScale=\"1\" pageWidth=\"827\" pageHeight=\"1169\" math=\"0\" shadow=\"0\"> <root> <mxCell id=\"0\"/> <mxCell id=\"1\" parent=\"0\"/> <mxCell id=\"2\" value=\"Start\" style=\"ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"> <mxGeometry x=\"280\" y=\"60\" width=\"80\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id=\"3\" value=\"Task A\" style=\"rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"> <mxGeometry x=\"160\" y=\"160\" width=\"100\" height=\"60\" as=\"geometry\"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id=\"4\" value=\"Task B\" style=\"rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"> <mxGeometry x=\"360\" y=\"160\" width=\"100\" height=\"60\" as=\"geometry\"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id=\"5\" value=\"End\" style=\"ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;\" vertex=\"1\" parent=\"1\"> <mxGeometry x=\"280\" y=\"300\" width=\"80\" height=\"40\" as=\"geometry\"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id=\"6\" relative=\"1\" as=\"geometry\"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id=\"7\" style=\"edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;\" edge=\"1\" instruction: Create a flowchart showing error handling: Start → Task → Error? → Retry or Fail → End.
xml:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/136.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="27.0.9">
  <diagram name="Page-1" id="QlA4gIGAaymZ01QpIyN0">
    <mxGraphModel dx="1358" dy="1922" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0">
      <root>
        <mxCell id="0" />
        <mxCell id="1" parent="0" />
        <mxCell id="2" value="Start" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#96FF96;strokeColor=#000000;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="490" y="-610" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="3" value="Perform Task" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#000000;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="480" y="-540" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="4" value="Error Occurred?" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFF2CC;strokeColor=#D6B656;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="480" y="-450" width="100" height="80" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="5" value="Retry" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D5E8D4;strokeColor=#82B366;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="340" y="-340" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="6" value="Fail" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F8CECC;strokeColor=#B85450;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="620" y="-340" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="7" value="End" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#FF9999;strokeColor=#000000;" vertex="1" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry x="490" y="-240" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="8" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="2" target="3" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="9" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="3" target="4" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="10" value="No" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="4" target="7" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
            <mxPoint x="530" y="-240" as="targetPoint" />
          </mxGeometry>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="11" value="Yes" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="4" target="5" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="12" value="Yes" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="4" target="6" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" />
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="13" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.572;exitY=0.998;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" source="5" target="3" parent="1">
          <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
            <mxPoint x="460" y="-510" as="targetPoint" />
            <Array as="points">
              <mxPoint x="398" y="-250" />
              <mxPoint x="398" y="-230" />
              <mxPoint x="300" y="-230" />
              <mxPoint x="300" y="-420" />
              <mxPoint x="300" y="-510" />
              <mxPoint x="340" y="-510" />
              <mxPoint x="390" y="-510" />
            </Array>
            <mxPoint x="410" y="-260" as="sourcePoint" />
          </mxGeometry>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="14" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" edge="1" source="6" target="7" parent="1">
